                    <!-- Cotton Silk Sarees -->
                    <section>
                            <div class = "products">
                                <div class = "container">
                                    <h1 class = "lg-title">Cotton Silk Sarees</h1>

                                        <!-- single product -->                             <!--------- 1 ---------->

                                                </div>

                                                        <span><i class = "fas fa-plus"></i></span>

                                                        <span><i class = "fas fa-shopping-cart"></i></span>

                    <!-- Satin Sarees -->

                    <!-- Lehanga -->
                        <section>                
                            <div class = "products">
                                <div class = "container">
                                    <h1 class = "lg-title">Lehanga</h1>
                                    <div class = "product-items">
                                        <!-- single product -->                             <!--------- 1 ---------->
                                        <div class = "product">
                                            <div class = "product-content">
                                                <div class = "product-img">
